alert.note: Alert for Buena Vista; Frazier Mountain Communities; West Side Mountains South of 198; West Side Mountains north of 198 (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 14 at 11:07AM PDT until March 14 at 7:00PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...South winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph. * WHERE...West Side Mountains north of 198, West Side Mountains South of 198, Buena Vista and Frazier Mountain Communities. * WHEN...Until 7 PM PDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Buena Vista; Frazier Mountain Communities; West Side Mountains South of 198; West Side Mountains north of 198
